required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Performance of Atypical Contact Lens Powers on Subjects With Astigmatism

brief_summary.textblock: This study will evaluate the fitting characteristics and physiological response of two toric lenses manufactured by Vistakon.

primary_outcome.measure: Assessment of Conjunctival Hyperemia in Subjects That Are High Myopes (Have a High Degree of Nearsightedness)
primary_outcome.description: Conjunctival hyperemia measures the redness across the white of the eye. The investigator used a grading scale of 0=none, 1=slight, 2=moderate, 3=severe.

primary_outcome.measure: Assessment of Conjunctival Hyperemia in Subjects That Are Hyperopes (Farsighted)
primary_outcome.description: Conjunctival hyperemia measures the redness across the white of the eye. The investigator used a grading scale of 0=none, 1=slight, 2=moderate, 3=severe.

primary_outcome.measure: Assessment of Conjunctival Hyperemia in Subjects That Are Oblique Astigmats (Have an Abnormally Curved Cornea)
primary_outcome.description: Conjunctival hyperemia measures the redness across the white of the eye. The investigator used a grading scale of 0=none, 1=slight, 2=moderate, 3=severe.

primary_outcome.measure: Assessment of Limbal Hyperemia in Subjects That Are High Myopes (Have a High Degree of Nearsightedness)
primary_outcome.description: Limbal hyperemia measures the redness around the edge of the cornea. The investigator used a grading scale of 0=none, 1=slight, 2=moderate, 3=severe.

primary_outcome.measure: Assessment of Limbal Hyperemia in Subjects That Are Hyperopes (Farsighted)
primary_outcome.description: Limbal hyperemia measures the redness around the edge of the cornea. The investigator used a grading scale of 0=none, 1=slight, 2=moderate, 3=severe.

primary_outcome.measure: Assessment of Limbal Hyperemia in Subjects That Are Oblique Astigmats (Have an Abnormally Curved Cornea)
primary_outcome.description: Limbal hyperemia measures the redness around the edge of the cornea. The investigator used a grading scale of 0=none, 1=slight, 2=moderate, 3=severe.

primary_outcome.measure: Assessment of Corneal Staining in Subjects That Are High Myopes (Have a High Degree of Nearsightedness)
primary_outcome.description: Corneal staining measures changes to the surface of the cornea, as evaluated by the degree of staining with sodium fluorescein solution. The investigator used a grading scale of 0=none, 1=slight, 2=moderate, 3=severe.

primary_outcome.measure: Assessment of Corneal Staining in Subjects That Are Hyperopes (Farsighted)
primary_outcome.description: Corneal staining measures changes to the surface of the cornea, as evaluated by the degree of staining with sodium fluorescein solution. The investigator used a grading scale of 0=none, 1=slight, 2=moderate, 3=severe.

primary_outcome.measure: Assessment of Corneal Staining in Subjects That Are Oblique Astigmats (Have an Abnormally Curved Cornea)
primary_outcome.description: Corneal staining measures changes to the surface of the cornea, as evaluated by the degree of staining with sodium fluorescein solution. The investigator used a grading scale of 0=none, 1=slight, 2=moderate, 3=severe.

primary_outcome.measure: Assessment of Conjunctival Staining in Subjects That Are High Myopes (Have a High Degree of Nearsightedness)
primary_outcome.description: Conjunctival staining measures the changes to the conjunctival surface as evaluated by the degree of staining with sodium fluorescein solution. The investigator used a grading scale of 0=none, 1=slight, 2=moderate, 3=severe.

primary_outcome.measure: Assessment of Conjunctival Staining in Subjects That Are Hyperopes (Farsighted)
primary_outcome.description: Conjunctival staining measures the changes to the conjunctival surface as evaluated by the degree of staining with sodium fluorescein solution. The investigator used a grading scale of 0=none, 1=slight, 2=moderate, 3=severe.

primary_outcome.measure: Assessment of Conjunctival Staining in Subjects That Are Oblique Astigmats (Have an Abnormally Curved Cornea)
primary_outcome.description: Conjunctival staining measures the changes to the conjunctival surface as evaluated by the degree of staining with sodium fluorescein solution. The investigator used a grading scale of 0=none, 1=slight, 2=moderate, 3=severe.

primary_outcome.measure: Assessment of Papillary Conjunctivitis in Subjects That Are High Myopes (Have a High Degree of Nearsightedness)
primary_outcome.description: Papillary conjunctivitis measures the changes to the conjunctival surface on the underside of the upper eyelid. The investigator used a grading scale of 0=none, 1=slight, 2=moderate, 3=severe.

primary_outcome.measure: Assessment of Papillary Conjunctivitis in Subjects That Are Hyperopes (Farsighted)
primary_outcome.description: Papillary conjunctivitis measures the changes to the conjunctival surface on the underside of the upper eyelid. The investigator used a grading scale of 0=none, 1=slight, 2=moderate, 3=severe.

primary_outcome.measure: Assessment of Papillary Conjunctivitis in Subjects That Are Oblique Astigmats (Have an Abnormally Curved Cornea)
primary_outcome.description: Papillary conjunctivitis measures the changes to the conjunctival surface on the underside of the upper eyelid. The investigator used a grading scale of 0=none, 1=slight, 2=moderate, 3=severe.

arm_group.description: senofilcon A silicone hydrogel toric contact lenses will be worn first. galyfilcon A silicone hydrogel toric contact lenses will be worn second.
galyfilcon A silicone hydrogel toric contact lenses worn first. senofilcon A silicone hydrogel toric contact lenses worn second.

intervention.description: silicone hydrogel contact lens for patients with astigmatism
silicone hydrogel contact lens for patients with astigmatism

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Able to wear study lenses in parameters available.
- At least 18
- understand and sign informed consent
- willing to follow the protocol
- achieve at least 6/9 Visual Acuity (VA), both eyes (OU) with study lenses
- hyperopes: +2.00 to +4.00 with -0.75 D cylinder around 180, high myopes: -6.00 to -8.00 with -1.25 D cylinder around 180
- oblique axis: -2.00 to -4.00 with -0.75 D cyl around 45 or 135, have worn Soft Contact Lenses's within last 6 months
Exclusion Criteria:
- Any ocular or systemic disorder which may contraindicate Contact Lens (CL) wear
- any topical ocular medication
- aphakic
- corneal refractive surgery,
- corneal distortion from hard CL wear or keratoconus
- pregnant or lactating
- grade 2 or worse slit lamp signs
- infectious disease
- previous clinical study within 2 weeks
- don't agree to participate

group.title: Senofilcon A/Galyfilcon A
group.description: senofilcon A silicone hydrogel toric contact lenses will be worn first. galyfilcon A silicone hydrogel toric contact lenses will be worn second.

group.title: Galyfilcon A/Senofilcon A
group.description: galyfilcon A silicone hydrogel toric contact lenses worn first. senofilcon A silicone hydrogel toric contact lenses worn second.

participants_list.participants: one subject moved away between the first period and second period.

group.title: All Completed Subjects
group.description: All subjects that completed the study were analyzed. One subject from the senofilcon A/ galyfilcon A arm dropped from the study between the first and second intervention. The subject moved out of town.

outcome.title: Assessment of Conjunctival Hyperemia in Subjects That Are High Myopes (Have a High Degree of Nearsightedness)
outcome.description: Conjunctival hyperemia measures the redness across the white of the eye. The investigator used a grading scale of 0=none, 1=slight, 2=moderate, 3=severe.
outcome.population: There were 11 subjects that were high myopes within the total completed population of 38.

group.title: Senofilcon A
group.description: This group represents all high myope subjects that completed the study and wore senofilcon A toric contact lenses as first or second intervention.

group.title: Galyfilcon A
group.description: This group represents all high myope subjects that completed the study and wore galyfilcon A toric contact lenses as first or second intervention.

measure.title: Assessment of Conjunctival Hyperemia in Subjects That Are High Myopes (Have a High Degree of Nearsightedness)
measure.description: Conjunctival hyperemia measures the redness across the white of the eye. The investigator used a grading scale of 0=none, 1=slight, 2=moderate, 3=severe.
measure.population: There were 11 subjects that were high myopes within the total completed population of 38.

analysis.groups_desc: Alternative hypothesis is that senoflicon A toric is non-inferior to galyfilcon A toric in conjunctival hyperemia.
analysis.estimate_desc: The mean difference is calculated as senofilcon A toric minus galyfilcon A toric.

outcome.population: There were 14 subjects that were hyperopes within the total completed population of 38.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The PI may not publish, divulge, reveal, disclose, or use the data and or results of the study without prior written consent of Vistakon.
